newsitem.title: UK: PolyGram buys rest of UK's Go!Discs.
newsitem.headline: PolyGram buys rest of UK's Go!Discs.

text.p: Music giant PolyGram NV said on Wednesday that it had bought the rest of British record label Go!Discs for an undisclosed sum from its founder and managing director Andy Macdonald.
PolyGram had previously owned 49 percent of the label, which has big names like Paul Weller and The Beautiful South on its books.
Macdonald is to leave the group.
